word: The ministers of God should be able to bring forth from the treasure house of His Word things new and old. "Educate, educate, educate," said the angel. "Give the people the truth. Lift up Jesus before them. Lead them in the path cast up for the ransomed of the Lord to walk in. Give them line upon line, and precept upon precept, here a little, and there a little. Never cease to study the Bible for yourselves, that you may in an intelligent manner present to the understanding of the people that which is to be."
